Name: Poligiros
Description: The capital of Halkidiki, known for its picturesque setting and historical significance.

Name: Kassandra
Description: One of the three peninsulas of Halkidiki, famous for its sandy beaches and vibrant tourism.

Name: Sithonia
Description: A scenic peninsula known for its natural beauty, crystal-clear waters, and peaceful atmosphere.

Name: Mount Athos
Description: A region famous for the monastic community and the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Mount Athos.

Name: Arnea
Description: A historic town located inland, known for its traditional architecture and cultural heritage.

Name: Nea Moudania
Description: A coastal town and important commercial center in Halkidiki, located near the western coast.
